net.minecraftforge.oredict

类 DyeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.oredict.DyeUtils

  • public class DyeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with ore dictionary dyes.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      DyeUtils() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.util.Optional<EnumDyeColor> colorFromStack(ItemStack stack)
      Get a dye's color.
      static java.util.OptionalInt dyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack stack)
      Get the dye damage from the stack, which can be passed into EnumDyeColor#byDyeDamage(int).
      static boolean isDye(ItemStack stack)
      Check if an item stack is a dye.
      static java.util.OptionalInt metaFromStack(ItemStack stack)
      Get the dye metadata from the stack, which can be passed into EnumDyeColor#byMetadata(int).
      static int rawDyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack stack)
      Similar to dyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack), except that it returns the raw integer (with a -1 sentinel); this follows vanilla conventions.
      static int rawMetaFromStack(ItemStack stack)
      Similar to metaFromStack(ItemStack), except that it returns the raw integer (with a -1 sentinel); this follows vanilla conventions.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • DyeUtils

        public DyeUtils()

    • 方法详细资料

      • isDye

        public static boolean isDye(ItemStack stack)
        Check if an item stack is a dye.
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        whether the stack is a dye

      • metaFromStack

        public static java.util.OptionalInt metaFromStack(ItemStack stack)
        Get the dye metadata from the stack, which can be passed into EnumDyeColor#byMetadata(int).
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        an OptionalInt holding the dye metadata for a dye, or an empty OptionalInt otherwise

      • rawMetaFromStack

        public static int rawMetaFromStack(ItemStack stack)
        Similar to metaFromStack(ItemStack), except that it returns the raw integer (with a -1 sentinel); this follows vanilla conventions.
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        the dye metadata for a dye, or -1 otherwise

      • dyeDamageFromStack

        public static java.util.OptionalInt dyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack stack)
        Get the dye damage from the stack, which can be passed into EnumDyeColor#byDyeDamage(int).
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        an OptionalInt holding the dye damage for a dye, or an empty OptionalInt otherwise

      • rawDyeDamageFromStack

        public static int rawDyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack stack)
        Similar to dyeDamageFromStack(ItemStack), except that it returns the raw integer (with a -1 sentinel); this follows vanilla conventions.
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        the dye damage for a dye, or -1 otherwise

      • colorFromStack

        public static java.util.Optional<EnumDyeColor> colorFromStack(ItemStack stack)
        Get a dye's color.
        参数:
        stack - the item stack
        返回:
        an Optional holding the dye color if present, or an empty Optional otherwise
